(CNN)Health officials continue to investigate after seven people died and at least 11 others have been infected with an adenovirus at a New Jersey health care facility, the New Jersey Department of Health said Wednesday.Sign up here to get The Results Are In with Dr. Sanjay Gupta every Tuesday from the CNN Health team.CNN's Nadia Kounang and Liv Kiely contributed to this report.
